name: Survivor Plane
description:
Shoot the zeppelins and beware of the missiles!

Survivor Plane is an easy to play 2D adventure game. You can control the plane by its tail. Shooting function of the airplane is automatic. You can shoot the zeppelins however you can't destroy their missiles. You have 3 lives at the beginning and you can get 3 more if you have a good score.

While trying to survive, get higher scores by shooting as many zeppelins as possible and collecting coins. Open your eyes for coinboxes, they give you 10 coins! Be careful, deathboxes can take a live from you. Have a great time.
